item.description: React plugin development React is a very popular web development framework from Facebook. It is used for highly responsive web applications that use JSX code for efficiency and fewer DOM updates. In developing a plugin or REACT I faced some challenges in the beginning when my learning was not adequate. But over time I could fall in love and finish this work. Back to blog
